item.title: Nettle soup
item.author: helo@forestgarden.wales (Jake Rayson)
item.description: Ingredients Â½ carrier bag stinging nettle tops 50g vegan margarine 1 large onion 1 litre vegetable stock 1 large potato, peeled & cut into cubes 1 large carrot, peeled & chopped Salt & pepper 2 tbsp Oatly creme fraiche Method Wash nettles, get rid of thick stalks, drain Melt vegan margarine in large saucepan, add onion, cook gently 5-7 minutes until softened Add stock, nettles, potato & carrot.
